about_the_game:
Includes five cosmetic items, including the Assault "Zephyr Alpha" suit skin, which cuts through remote enemies with its chakram.
The Flame Dragon, a bright red dragon that seems to be covered in flames! Equip yourself with the cosmetic items and unleash a fiery onslaught like a raging inferno!

Contains the following content:
Zephyr Alpha Fire Dragon Set
- Fire Dragon (Zephyr: Exosuit Skin)
- Cloud Dragon (decal)
- The Influence (emote)
- Come get some! (stamp)
- Mini Dragon (charm)

Note: Items included in this set may also be available for purchase individually or as part of other sets. Please be careful of duplicate purchases.
Skins, decals, and charms are cosmetic items that change the appearance of an exosuit and have no other effect.
Emotes and stamps are items that can be used to customize the in-game Comm Wheel.
Obtained additional contents can be used by going from the title screen to the in-game home screen.
Note: This content does not support Steam Family Sharing.

Note: This content does not support Steam Family Sharing.
